name: MirrorLand - Virtual Gallery (mobile)
description:
(You can find PC version in: "view all by MirrorLand" or on the MirrorLand website)

This is a virtual gallery of the artworks of the artist Era Daliha Sagrada. Created for the MirrorLand website. Right now it's in beta test. Later in this project will be more rooms with different art collections, interactions with objects, art pieces, and more.

Open your channel with Mirrorland..
